title._content: Image taken from page 114 of 'The Old Ludgings of Stirling: being the ancient residences of the nobility, clergy, and civic dignitaries not hitherto delineated and described ... Illustrated by forty pen and ink drawings by the author'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Old Ludgings of Stirling: being the ancient residences of the nobility, clergy, and civic dignitaries not hitherto delineated and described ... Illustrated by forty pen and ink drawings by the author" Author: FLEMING, James Sturk. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10370.e.32." Page: 114 Place of Publishing: Stirling Date of Publishing: 1897 Publisher: Eneas Mackay Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001251373 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
